plot: A synecdoche, contrasting a macro view of the cosmic drama and a micro view of life, where a girl who loses her mother, discovers who her real father is.
title: Finding Acadia
plot_es: A synecdoche, contrasting a macro view of the cosmic drama and a micro view of life, where a girl who loses her mother, discovers who her real father is.
plot_en: A synecdoche, contrasting a macro view of the cosmic drama and a micro view of life, where a girl who loses her mother, discovers who her real father is.
